App Name: QR Scanner & Barcode Scanner 2019
App Package Name: com.kitkats.qrscanner

Brief:

The QR Scanner & Barcode Scanner 2019 is an intuitive and user-friendly app designed to read and generate a variety of QR codes and barcodes. Whether you're looking to decode content like text, URLs, product details, or connect to a Wi-Fi network without a hassle, this app ensures simplicity and efficiency right from your pocket.
